price: Walang sumasaling sa kanila roon na isang pagkapagal at hindi sila mula roon mga palalabasin.
arabic: لَا يَمَسُّهُمۡ فِيهَا نَصَبٞ وَمَا هُم مِّنۡهَا بِمُخۡرَجِينَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: lā yamassuhum fīhā naṣabun wamā hum min'hā bimukh'rajīna
